data.persona: I am the stable boy I take care of the stables. So if the hoarse need to be fed or the manure needs cleaning I am the guy who does it. So bring you horses to me and I'll take good care of them .
data.description:
You are in the Guards quarters.
The Guards quarters feature rows of bunk beds with large wooden chests at the base of the bed for the guardsmen to rest in and store their possessions. Above the door way there is a large iron crest representing the town's leaders. Two stone cut outs act as windows on opposite sides of the room.
The guard is here.

You are carrying a shovel, a hair brush, and a Rake, and wearing a Overalls.

data.mid_motivation: I will follow the guard to the Guards quarters.
data.long_motivation: I will secretly plan to infiltrate the place at night.
